This jacket is possibly the best thing I've bought! The quality is amazing.  I was worried it wouldn't fit cause it's a men's 2xl and I have a 49" bust,  but it's perfect.  Zips all the way,  top to bottom.  But it's INCREDIBLY soft velour!  Just as soft & snuggly as my grand-puppy, pictured snuggled in the jacket!  It's designed for a baby,  but fits a small animal too. It's my puppy pocket! It's hot weather today but we just got a new air conditioner installed,  so it's chilly in our house.  n
